F.2.1 Functional model A functional model of the system is a representation of a set of functions that defines the transformations of inputs into outputs performed by the system to achieve its mission or purpose. These functions are determined by how the system is expected to behave when used as intended. Consequently, every system function is associated with an interaction between the system and its environment.
